p: Attachment of influenza virus to sialic acids on cellular receptors and fusion of the viral and cell membranes are functions mediated by the HA globular head (HA1) and conserved stalk (HA2) domains, respectively [ 31]. Vaccines that target the conserved stalk domain for induction of cross-protection are supported by the encouraging results from animal models [ 27, 32, 33, 34].
